children.title: Database Design
children.comment: Schema design for hierarchical node storage with version history.

code.content:
-- SQL schema for mind map nodes
CREATE TABLE nodes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'pending',
    priority VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'medium',
    parent_id UUID REFERENCES nodes(id),
    comment TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    days_spent INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE node_code (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    node_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES nodes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    language VARCHAR(50),
    content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE INDEX idx_nodes_parent_id ON nodes(parent_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_nodes_status ON nodes(status);

children.title: DevOps & Deployment
children.comment: CI/CD pipeline, containerization, and cloud deployment setup.

code.content:
# Docker Compose configuration
version: '3.8'
services:
  frontend:
    build: ./frontend
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    environment:
      - REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:5000
    depends_on:
      - backend

  backend:
    build: ./backend
    ports:
      - "5000:5000"
    environment:
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@db:5432/mindmap
    depends_on:
      - db

  db:
    image: postgres:15
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=mindmap
      - POSTGRES_USER=user
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=pass
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

volumes:
  postgres_data:

nodes.title: Documentation & Testing
nodes.comment: Comprehensive documentation and automated testing suite.

code.content:
# Mind Map Documentation

## Features

- **Hierarchical Nodes**: Create nested mind maps with unlimited depth
- **Status Tracking**: Track progress with pending/in-progress/completed states
- **Code Blocks**: Embed syntax-highlighted code in any programming language
- **LLM Integration**: Add AI prompts for automated analysis and suggestions
- **CLI Commands**: Execute terminal commands directly from nodes

## Usage

```javascript
// Create a new mind map
const mindMap = new MindMapRenderer();
mindMap.loadData(jsonData);
mindMap.render('#container');
```

## API Reference

### Node Structure

```json
{
  "id": "unique-identifier",
  "title": "Node Title",
  "status": "pending|in-progress|completed",
  "priority": "low|medium|high",
  "children": []
}
```

nodes.cliCommand: npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:serve
